mapper.select: select corpInfo_No, corp_name, corp_type, corp_address, corpInfo_Sal, corpInfo_empNo, corpInfo_money, corpInfo_intro, corpInfo_birth from companylist
select corpInfo_No, corp_name, corp_type, corp_address, corpInfo_Sal, corpInfo_empNo, corpInfo_money, corpInfo_intro, corpInfo_birth from companylist where corpInfo_No=#{corpInfo_No}
